name: Azin - This Is Where I Am

metadata.name: This Is Where I Am
metadata.description:
I address the creation of myths and compositional figures; figures that remind one of the inceptions of time and place and in which every single item indicates a latent and eternal power. 
These large-scale drawings show volumetric and ambiguous masses of plants, animals, and humans in metamorphosis. At the same time, these expressive combinations can also be viewed from an apocalyptic perspective...
